author: Special Correspondent
text:
Gold and diamond shops in the delta region downed shutters on Wednesday the first day of their three-day stir to protest the imposition of 1 per cent excise on gold jewellery made and purchased. Union Finance Minister Arun Jaitley had proposed the excise duty imposition in his Budget presented on Monday.

Kumbakonam Gold Merchants’ Welfare Association president T.R. Sekar and secretary S. Subbarayan said the excise duty imposition would grossly affect gold jewellery trade and would tax the buyers unnecessarily
title: Jewellers down shutters
